com.iver.core.mdiManager
Class WindowInfoSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.core.mdiManager.WindowInfoSupport

public class WindowInfoSupport
extends java.lang.Object

This class listens to changes in WindowInfo objects, and reflects this changes in the associated window.
